vistra.framework.graph.item.state

Interface IItemStateHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IEdgeStateHandler, IVertexStateHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EdgeStateHandler, VertexStateHandler

    public interface IItemStateHandler
    An interface for an item state handler.

    This handler has a stack as cellar at its disposal. It is therefore able to hold the state history and to set a previous state.

    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
    See Also:
    IVertexStateHandler, IEdgeStateHandler

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handlePreviousState()
      Handles the previous state: removes the last state from the cellar and sets the removed state as actual state.
      void handleSolutionMember()
      Handles solution.
      void handleUnexplored()
      Handles unexplored.
      void handleVisited()
      Handles visited.
